I cannot provide personal preferences. however, i can suggest some additional information that can help you choose the best resort based on your needs and preferences. you might consider the following when making your decision:

1. cost: factor in your budget as some locations can be more expensive than others. 2. proximity: consider the distance from where you live to the resort, as this can have an impact on travel costs. 3. snow conditions: some resorts may have better snow conditions than others, so do some research to find out the best time to visit. 4. facilities: consider the availability of beginner-friendly slopes, dedicated snowboarding parks, and expert instructors. 5. activities: determine if the resort has more activities that you might be interested in beyond snowboarding, such as après-ski activities or other winter sports. based on your preferences and budget, you can choose the resort that suits you best.
